title: DDFP 369: The Vereen brothers
itunes:title: DDFP 369: The Vereen brothers
description:
Shek is joined by Shane and Brock Vereen to kibitz about the Patriots Super Bowl victory, superheroes and much more (2:01). Later, Shek and Handsome Hank talk training camp (22:27), Dez Bryant's contract situation and Shek's visit to Comic-Con (27:03).  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
